column1: You can safely use Excel or another spreadsheet software to view and edit answers.
This file contains solutions (or answers) for the problem.
When user answering questions, program collects tags associated with chosen answers.
If an answer contains all the gathered tags, it will be shown in results.
If an answer contains some other tags, it will still be shown if it has all the gathered tags.
However if at least one of gathered tags is missing, an answer will be discarded.
If no answer has been found, program will display am according message.
First column is a name of an answer
column2: Second column is an additional description of an answer
column3: Third and furhter columns are tags. One column should contain only one tag.

column2: Come on, don't lie to me
